title: "ICCAT MSE References" 

output:
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    vertical_layout: scroll
    self_contained: true
  
params:
  dir: "directory"    
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(readxl)
library(glue)

#dir <- "C:/Users/Ai Kimoto/Documents/GitHub/iccat-mse-web/"
txtref = data.frame(read_excel(paste0(dir,"ICCAT MSE Web TEXT_read.xlsx"), sheet = "references", col_names = TRUE))
txtref <- txtref[,c(1:9)]

txt = read_excel(paste0(dir,"ICCAT MSE Web TEXT_read.xlsx"), sheet = "GEN", col_names = TRUE)

txtref$Links <- paste0(
  #ENG
  paste0('<a href="', txtref$ENGlink, '">',  '<img src="https://iccat.github.io/iccat-mse-web/images/united-kingdom.png" width="40" /></a>'),
  #FRA
  ifelse(is.na(txtref$FRAlink),"",paste0('<a href="', txtref$FRAlink, '" target="_blank">',  '<img src="https://iccat.github.io/iccat-mse-web/images/france.png" width="40" /></a>')),
  #ESP
  ifelse(is.na(txtref$ESPlink),"",paste0('<a href="', txtref$ESPlink, '" target="_blank">',  '<img src="https://iccat.github.io/iccat-mse-web/images/spain.png" width="40" /></a>'))
)

# reference list
refs <- txtref[,c(1:6,10)]

lg <- 1
sp_list <- c("NALB","BFT","NSWO","WSKJ","multiTT","Other Species","GEN")
ref_list <- c("Materials","Rec/Res","Meetings","SCRS Docs","Others")

```

###  {#GENMaterials} 
```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
#7"GEN",2"Rec/Res"
nsp <- 7 #1"NALB",2"BFT",3"NSWO",4"WSKJ",5"multiTT",6"Other Species",7"GEN"
nref <- 1 #1"Materials",2"Rec/Res",3"Meetings",4"SCRS Docs",5"Others"
rref <- paste0("ref",nref)
refs1 <- refs[refs$Species==sp_list[nsp] & refs$Item==ref_list[nref],]
refs1 <- refs1[,-c(1:2)]

#please select ref...for 3 languages
cat(glue('
<div style="background-color:#f8f2e2; padding:0px; text-align: center;">
  <hr style="border: none; height: 2px; background-color: #ccc;" />
  <h1 style= "font-size:1.7em; color:#001A3E; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline;"> 
      {paste(sp_list[nsp],":",na.omit(txt[txt$item==rref,1+2]))}/
      {na.omit(txt[txt$item==rref,2+2])}/
      {na.omit(txt[txt$item==rref,3+2])}</h1>

</div>
'))

datatable(
  refs1,
  escape = FALSE,
  filter = "top",
  options = list(
    pageLength = nrow(refs1),
    scrollY = "400px",
    scrollCollapse = TRUE,
    autoWidth = FALSE,
    lengthChange = FALSE,  
    columnDefs = list(
      list(width = '50px', targets = 0),  
      list(width = '100px', targets = 1),  
      list(width = '300px', targets = 2),  
      list(width = '100px', targets = 3),  
      list(width = '80px', targets = 4),  
      list(className = 'dt-left', targets = "_all")
    )
  ),
  rownames = FALSE
)

```
